comments:
Build ID: Build id: M20060629-1905

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Open eclipse
2.Right click on any file
3.Select box for other file text encoding is not visible (often there is white rectangle or part of screen which is under eclpise) 


More information:
This happens for all files (php, cfm, java). It happend when my platform changed from 3.2 to 3.2.1. 
This always happens. I can't change this.
This is log file when starting eclipse.Nothig more is shown there even if I make file properties window active.

Can you supply a screen shot showing the problem? A quick try (with 3.3 however) doesn't show any problems.

Created an attachment (id=59634)
Properties window

Properties window where select box for txt file encoding is not usable

Created an attachment (id=59635)
Properties window

Properties window where select box for txt file encoding is not usable

I'm going to mark this as a dup. Once the other defect gets fixed we should test this scenario and ensure that it too is fixed.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 175069 ***

org.eclipse.php.internal.ui.PHPUiPlugin is failing on activation\ of it's decorator - org.eclipse.php.internal.ui.util.ProblemsLabelDecorator will not load - the stack trace should be logged in a seperate bug to them.

What happpensif you restart, turn off your PHP decorators and then open on a java file?
I have disabled PHP(PDT) plugin but nothing has changed. Same problem occurs. The log file without PHP(PDT) is empty, but same problems with UI occurs.

I have found new situation.

When I open the file preferences dialog and wait long enough (from 5sec to even 1 minute) select box with encoding appears. Hope it helps!
What do you mean by select box? Encoding can only be changed by the proeprties dialog or the menu item
OK I see now - it is the preference dialog. What type of file is this? It appears that the encoding query is slow for you.
